description:
As per:

curl -H "X-Auth-Token:<redacted>" -H "Accept: application/xml" http://127.0.0.1:8774/v1.1/os-hosts

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     application, catch_exc_info=False)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/webob/request.py", line 1023, in call_application
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     app_iter = application(self.environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     response = self.app(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/webob/dec.py", line 147, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     resp = self.call_func(req, *args, **self.kwargs)

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     action=action)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/home/nova/code/nova/trunk/nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py", line 428, in serialize
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     self.serialize_body(response, response_data, content_type, action)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/home/nova/code/nova/trunk/nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py", line 438, in serialize_body
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     response.body = serializer.serialize(data, action)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/home/nova/code/nova/trunk/nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py", line 283, in serialize
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return self.dispatch(data, action=action)

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:
title: Hosts API extension doesn't serialize to XML
